verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on taraS~ad-v

frameset.edef: to lie in wait for, to ambush, to look for

example.parse: (TOP (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN الشَعْب)) (VP (IV3MS+IV يِتْرَصَّد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ُه)))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِقْتَصّ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP مِنّ) (NP (PRON_3MS ُه))))))))
